snippet: Carl Pettersson, playing on a course where he is a member, shot an eight-under-par 62 to take a one-stroke lead after the first round of the Wyndham Championship in Greensboro, N.C.
abstract: Carl Pettersson, playing on his home course, takes first-round lead at the Wyndham Championship golf tournament in Greensboro, NC.
lead_paragraph: Carl Pettersson, playing on a course where he is a member, shot an eight-under-par 62 to take a one-stroke lead after the first round of the Wyndham Championship in Greensboro, N.C.

headline.seo: Carl Pettersson Leads Wyndham Championship With 62
headline.main: Playing on Home Course, Pettersson Leads With 62
headline.print_headline: Playing on Home Course, Pettersson Leads With 62
